function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of assessment of infectious disease behavior in the strategies released by SRS","Impact":"Potential for strategies to be ineffective in mitigating contagious diseases in the built environment","Mitigation":"Conduct a thorough assessment of the strategies to ensure they address the behavior of infectious diseases","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Public health officials, building planners, SRS","Owner":"Public health organizations, SRS"},{"Description":"Weak sustainability approach and the assumption of substitutability between economy and nature","Impact":"Risk of compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs","Mitigation":"Adopt a strong sustainability approach that prioritizes the preservation of natural capital and the environment","Technologies":"Sustainable development technologies, renewable energy, green building practices","People":"Environmental policymakers, sustainability advocates, government agencies","Owner":"Environmental NGOs, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inconsistency in the level of environmental and economic sustainability of the strategies","Impact":"Potential for implementation of strategies with high environmental impact and economic cost","Mitigation":"Ensure that strategies selected prioritize both environmental and economic sustainability to achieve balance","Technologies":"Lifecycle analysis tools, sustainable materials, energy-efficient systems","People":"Building planners, sustainability consultants, environmental engineers","Owner":"Building owners, sustainability consultants"}]}
